data.message: As I look at my life when I first took that pill the feeling it gave me was so real, never wished I took it can't look back all I know is this shit I'm on is whack . Iggy ain't got nothing on me her bs is my war world three. I sit back and think wtf do I do I'm on the brink. Snap back to reality and realize that how lucky I am to be alive.

replies.message: I believe in u Marcie Hudson...but u have to believe in yourself to accomplish ur goals in life
